title: Ticket #7400: Update AWS Lambda functions by December 31
description: Node.js v8.10 will be declared end-of-life on December 31. AWS will stop allowing new Node.js v8.10 functions January 6, 2020. We're updating to the '12.x' runtime to delay updating again as long as possible
